title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Freedom Of Information Act
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Freedom Of Information Act              Freedom Of Information Act      All requests for information about Mammoth Cave National Park made through the Freedom of Information Act must be submitted to the park's Public Information Officer.  Please direct all correspondence to:  Vickie Carson Public Information Officer Mammoth Cave National Park P.O. Box 7 Mammoth Cave, KY  42259
